title: Mouse Interaction with Objects
description: How can an object interact with the mouse? This video looks at how you can implement basic mouse interaction (rollover, mousePressed) with your own code and HTML5 canvas.

timestamps.title: Using dist() to Determine Whether the Mouse is Over an Object
Adding Properties to an Object with a Mouse Click

codeExamples.title: Highlight Bubble
codeExamples.description: Demonstration of highlighting a bubble when it is clicked.
